content: It depends on how the society chooses to handle the innovation and the truth of magic-producing music. In a pessimistic scenario, people may become overly reliant on the machines to produce music, leading to a loss of creativity and appreciation for the art form. On the other hand, in a more optimistic scenario, the innovation could be used to enhance the music-making process, allowing for even greater artistic expression and appreciation for the beauty of music. Additionally, the discovery of the truth behind magic-producing music could lead to a deeper understanding and appreciation for the role of emotions in art, and inspire people to create music in new and exciting ways. Ultimately, the impact of the innovation on society would depend on the values and priorities of the society itself.
